Abstract

    This PEP references :pep:`8` and :pep:`257` for style guidelines.
    See also PEP 20 for the Zen of Python.
    See :pep:`the original proposal <1#discussing-a-pep>` for context.

Introduction

    As described in :pep:`3107`, we extend the functionality.
    This builds on PEP 484 and pep 526.
    For type hints, see :pep:`Type Hints <484>` specification.

    More details at https://peps.python.org/pep-0257/ for docstrings.
